name: Slime Roll
summary:
Our game, developed for the Mini Jam, embraces the theme of Fusion and incorporates the required limitation of "Control the Environment." In this fast-paced and creative adventure, players will dive into a world where the fusion of objects and abilities takes center stage.

As the player explores various levels, they will encounter unique objects and elements that can be fused together to create powerful synergies. With the ability to control the environment, players can manipulate and combine these objects to overcome obstacles and navigate through challenging puzzles.

To navigate the game world, players will utilize the classic WASD controls for movement, providing a smooth and intuitive experience. Additionally, they will harness the power of fusion through the use of special abilities. Pressing the spacebar allows the character to perform a dynamic jump, while the Q key activates a heavy ability with tremendous impact. For explosive situations, players can unleash the fused power by pressing the E key.

Our game truly embodies the theme of Fusion by emphasizing the combination of objects and abilities to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles. With the limitation of "Control the Environment," players are encouraged to think creatively and strategically to manipulate their surroundings and forge their path to victory.

Join us in this thrilling adventure, where fusion and environmental control are the keys to success. Can you master the art of fusion and conquer the challenges that lie ahead? Get ready to experience a game that pushes the boundaries of creativity and control in the Mini Jam!
